prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Bass, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Bass, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, with no Synth Pad included.
